title: Bug 102516: JDBC Data Set Editor should load tables and columns on demand
description: Bug 102516: JDBC Data Set Editor should load tables and columns on demand. The JDBC Data Set Editor page for a SQL Query has a tree control that lists the tables and columns in your data source.
OB: When the data set editor is opened, the entire schema is queried and it takes some time. Eventually, a message saying 'Only 500 items can be viewed in the available list...' is displayed.
EB: The load of the tree should be deferred until the user expands the tree or applies a filter. This will improve the performance of the data set editor.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the data set editor. 2. Notice that the entire schema is queried and it takes some time. 3. Eventually, a message saying 'Only 500 items can be viewed in the available list...' is displayed. Refer to Bug 101372 for an additional feature request to filter based on schema.
